info.name: FWKZT Main Site Theme BETA
info.description:
This theme has various site fixes including a custom login screen.

The theme was written by me and only me.

The theme is an edit of wordpress' shitty base.

This theme was a personal project so do not flame me for it being shitty or broken.
info.additionalInfo:
-Initial Theme Release
-Fixed Searchbar
-Re worked layouts

Update 0.1:
-Added Background (changeable in the script)
-Fixed Login Screen
-Reworked ALL Menus and Cards
-Removed Glass Effect to reduce lag on lower end browsers/pcs

Update 0.2:
-Re added forum wrapper details
-Animated Avatars Further
-Fixed color (Minor color changes not noticeable.)
-Fixed bugs in theme causing aspect ratio issues on smaller screens
-Fixed animations to sync and animate together to help performance (maybe).
-Removed Borders on some elements
-Removed Custom Font not loading.
